column2: "Ugh... I wish I didn't have to go. Maybe if I was majorly hurt I could avoid doing missions for a while."
"Why is everyone so keen to get things done around here? I don't understand it."
"Sigh... With the technology they have these days, I wish they'd find a way to transfer talent over to people who want it."
"I didn't want to be an ARKS op, but that's all I'm fit to do."
"I bet that really annoys people who'd do anything to join ARKS, but can't."
"Why is the talent you need to join ARKS dealt out so randomly? Why couldn't she have it and not me?"
"I've got to ask, why is it that you fight? Wait, never mind. Pretend I didn't say anything."
"Sigh... I'm sorry to act so depressed. It's just, my friend got mad at me for having so little motivation."
"She's got the fire you need to be an ARKS op. I have no idea why it was my fate and not hers."
"It's really hard to find a reason to fight. It's not something you can just fake."
"I'm going to try to think less. I finally realized there are just too many thoughts running around my brain."
"Now I finally have a reason to fight, a fire that burns inside me."
